pages.text: Here is a list with all unlisted controls. All other controlls are avaible under ESC -> Options... -> Controls...

$(li)$(bold)Mouse Move:$()$(br)Moves the camera.$(br)$(li)$(bold)Scroll:$()$(br)Scrolls to the hotbar or a list.$(br)$(li)$(bold)Mouse (in Inventory):$()$(br)Look one the page: $(l:gui/inventory_mouse)Inventory Mouse Control$(/l).$(li)$(bold)Esc (in game):$()$(br)Open the menu.$(li)$(bold)Esc (in any gui):$()$(br)Close the gui.$(li)$(bold)F1:$()$(br)Toggles the Heads-Up Display.$(li)$(bold)F3:$()$(br)Shows the information screen.
